text.tspan: Long-run unemployment and real wage growth across the OECD,
Unit 16 'Technological progress, employment, and living standards in the long run’ Section 16.8 'Institutions and policies:
Why do some countries do better than others?' in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available at: https://tinyco.re/16081220
